article_title: Homeless dad pays it forward in the best way
article_text: James Moss isn't a stranger to being homeless and hungry. But thanks to help from the #GoBeKind Tour, this father is getting back on his feet and paying it forward in the best possible way. VPC

article_summary:
But thanks to help from the #GoBeKind Tour, this father is getting back on his feet and paying it forward in the best possible way.
James Moss isn't a stranger to being homeless and hungry.
